name: Historical benthos data from the Pre-deltaic Romanian Black Sea Coast in 1960
description: The dataset comprises data on the substrate type, temperature,salinity and benthos from 58 samplescolected in Danube front area in the period March 1960 - July 1960, (Sulina-Portita sector, Romanian Black Sea Coast). The sedimentsamples were taken with a Van-Veen grab, the sampling size is was - 0.1 m2. The samples have been preserved with 10% buffered formalin, then sieved through a 2 mm, 0.25 mm and0.10 mm mesh sieve and subsequently stored in 70%ethanol. The database comprisestaxonomic and quantitative data (individuals count, density and wet weight biomassper square meter) for 95 macrobenthicspecies and 10 supraspecificgroups.
